title: 4 Quick Steps to Copy a Facebook Profile Link on a Phone

steps.title: Open the Facebook app.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app. This looks like a white f with a blue background. Facebook is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . You can also go to https://www.facebook.com/ in a mobile browser. Be sure to log into your account. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Navigate to a profile.
steps.content: Navigate to a profile. Use the search bar at the top-right of the screen to find someone on Facebook. If you want to copy your own profile's URL, tap ☰ and then tap your name at the top. You'll be redirected to your profile.

steps.title: Tap ••• .
steps.content: Tap ••• . You can find this at the top-right corner of the screen. This will be next to a magnifying glass icon. A new page will open. If you're using a browser, this will be next to Message .

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Copy link.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Copy link . You'll see the URL underneath [Name]'s Profile link . Tapping this button will automatically copy the link to your device's clipboard. If you're using a browser, this will be Copy link to profile . You can now paste the URL into another platform, such as Messages or Instagram , to share the profile with others.
